text: Misoli kasone, ki iTavrot ʙa onho (jahudiho) ʙor sud, sipas onro ʙarnadostand, (ja'ne ʙa on amal nakardand), misli on xar ast, ki kitoʙhoero ʙar pust ʙor mekunad va namedonad dar on cist. Ci ʙad misolest, misoli mardume, ki ojoti Allohro duruƣ sumurdand va az on manfi'at naʙurdand. Va Alloh sitamkoronero, ki az hududi muqarrar kardai Alloh ʙerun meravand, hidojat namekunad
